column.name: T_CATID
column.valueComputed: (select T_ID from DMCCATEG_DBT where T_LEVELTYPE = 1 and T_CODE = 'Треб. с н.с. брок')

column.name: T_CATNUM
column.valueComputed: (select T_NUMBER from DMCCATEG_DBT where T_LEVELTYPE = 1 and T_CODE = 'Треб. с н.с. брок')
